    • Constructor Detail

      • PulsarQueryPublisher

        public PulsarQueryPublisher(SharedPulsarClient sharedPulsarClient,
                            Map<String,Object> producerConf,
                            String queryTopicName,
                            String responseTopicName)
                     throws com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException
        Creates a PulsarQueryPublisher from a SharedPulsarClient and appropriate configuration.
        Parameters:
        sharedPulsarClient - The SharedPulsarClient used to get a PulsarClient to create a Producer from.
        producerConf - The configuration to create a Pulsar producer with.
        queryTopicName - The name of the topic to publish messages to.
        responseTopicName - The name of the topic that corresponding PulsarSubscribers will consume messages from.
        Throws:
        com.yahoo.bullet.pubsub.PubSubException - if there's an error creating the Pulsar producer.
